verses.verse: And at that time <S%H6256><s%> shall Michael <S%H4317><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> up, the great <S%H1419><s%> prince <S%H8269><s%> which stands <S%H5975><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of your people: <S%H5971><s%> and there shall be a time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble, <S%H6869><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as never <S%H3808><s%> was since there was a nation <S%H1471><s%> even to that same <S%H1931><s%> time: <S%H6256><s%> and at that time <S%H6256><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> shall be delivered, <S%H4422><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> one that shall be found <S%H4672><s%> written <S%H3789><s%> in the book. <S%H5612><s%>

And many <S%H7227><s%> of them that sleep <S%H3463><s%> in the dust <S%H6083><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%> shall awake, <S%H6974><s%> some <S%H428><s%> to everlasting <S%H5769><s%> life, <S%H2416><s%> and some <S%H428><s%> to shame <S%H2781><s%> and everlasting <S%H5769><s%> contempt. <S%H1860><s%>

And they that be wise <S%H7919><s%> shall shine <S%H2094><s%> as the brightness <S%H2096><s%> of the firmament; <S%H7549><s%> and they that turn many <S%H7227><s%> to righteousness <S%H6663><s%> as the stars <S%H3556><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> and ever. <S%H5703><s%>

But you, O Daniel, <S%H1840><s%> shut <S%H5640><s%> up the words, <S%H1697><s%> and seal <S%H2856><s%> the book, <S%H5612><s%> even to the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end: <S%H7093><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> shall run <S%H7751><s%> to and fro, <S%H7751><s%> and knowledge <S%H1847><s%> shall be increased. <S%H7235><s%>

Then I Daniel <S%H1840><s%> looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there stood <S%H5975><s%> other <S%H312><s%> two, <S%H8147><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> on this <S%H2008><s%> side of the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river, <S%H2975><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on that side of the bank <S%H8193><s%> of the river. <S%H2975><s%>

And one said <S%H559><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was on the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river, <S%H2975><s%> How <S%H5704><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> shall it be to the end <S%H7093><s%> of these wonders? <S%H6382><s%>

And I heard <S%H8085><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> in linen, <S%H906><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was on the waters <S%H4325><s%> of the river, <S%H2975><s%> when he held <S%H7311><s%> up his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> and his left <S%H8040><s%> hand <S%H8040><s%> to heaven, <S%H8064><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> by him that lives <S%H2416><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> that it shall be for a time, <S%H4150><s%> times, <S%H4150><s%> and an half; <S%H2677><s%> and when he shall have accomplished <S%H3615><s%> to scatter <S%H5310><s%> the power <S%H3027><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things shall be finished. <S%H3615><s%>
And I heard, <S%H8085><s%> but I understood <S%H995><s%> not: then said <S%H559><s%> I, O my Lord, <S%H113><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> shall be the end <S%H319><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> things?

And he said, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H3212><s%> your way, Daniel: <S%H1840><s%> for the words <S%H1697><s%> are closed <S%H5640><s%> up and sealed <S%H2856><s%> till <S%H5704><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> of the end. <S%H7093><s%>

Many <S%H7227><s%> shall be purified, <S%H1305><s%> and made white, <S%H3835><s%> and tried; <S%H6884><s%> but the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall do wickedly: <S%H7561><s%> and none <S%H3808><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall understand; <S%H995><s%> but the wise <S%H7919><s%> shall understand. <S%H995><s%>

And from the time <S%H6256><s%> that the daily <S%H8548><s%> sacrifice shall be taken <S%H5493><s%> away, <S%H5493><s%> and the abomination <S%H8251><s%> that makes desolate <S%H8074><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> up, there shall be a thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ninety <S%H8673><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he that waits, <S%H2442><s%> and comes <S%H5060><s%> to the thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

But go <S%H3212><s%> you your way till the end <S%H7093><s%> be: for you shall rest, <S%H5117><s%> and stand <S%H5975><s%> in your lot <S%H1486><s%> at the end <S%H7093><s%> of the days. <S%H3117><s%>
